description: Arbeli-Almozlino, Shoshana -- Photographs; Moses, Eli -- Photographs
label: Health Minister Shoshana Arbeli Almuslino visited Eli Moses and his child Adi in hospital after the family was heavily injured by an explosiv bottle on the Shomron Main Road which was thrown by an Arab terrorist.
